div.p: 4x4 also known as AWD (all wheel drive) vehicle gets traction on all the four wheels thus making it easier to maneuver and control on difficult terrain, on highway also it has its own advantage.
Suitable for long trip, terain, carying heavy load with max 1-4 pax
Compact Cars are cars that are bigger than a supermini and smaller than a mid-sized car.
Suitable for short trip around town with max 1-4 pax
Sedan Cars are 4 door cars with a longer body that give a comfortable ride around town.
Suitable for long trip around town with max 1-4 pax
MPV Cars are 4 door cars with a longer body that give a comfortable ride around town and can fit more passenger. It has Luxury feeling around it.
Suitable for long trip around town with max 1-7 pax
We are flexible on our time, book anytime and anywhere with a click of a button!
Our Vehicles Are all brand new and money back guarente
We offer a loyalty programe to our reacuring customer so you can enjoy great benifiets when you rent from us regularly
We have fixed price so you do not have to worry on changing rates and its the same through all our destinations!
Our mobile app is smooth and easy to us. User Friendly and convenice
